property.name: application.locale
property.description: Application Locale. If it's changed, log messages are also changed.

property.name: demo.mode
property.description: Demo mode. If it's true, app works in testing mode and the admin page appears hidden.

property.name: extjs.ajax.disable.cache
property.description: ExtJS Ajax Cache config. If set it to false, web browser's cache is enabled and modified JavaScript doesn't get applied. So web browser's cache must be deleted.

property.name: fs.browser.download.max.file.size
property.description: Max size of download files in File System Browser

property.name: fs.browser.upload.max.file.size
property.description: Max size of upload files in File System Browser.

property.name: fs.browser.upload.timeout
property.description: Sets HTTP timeout when uploading files in File System Browser.

property.name: hive.query.result.max.download.size
property.description: Max size of download query results in Hive Query Editor.

property.name: hdfs.delete.forbidden.paths
property.description: Lis of non-deletable file paths in File System Browser

property.name: working.path
property.description: Path to save logs for actions

property.name: artifact.caching
property.description: Options for caching whether to save artifacs such as MapReduce jar files. If it's on, caching is enabled so it might slow down.

property.name: artifact.cache.path
property.description: Path where artifacs such as MapReduce JAR files are saved.

property.name: innerData.cache.path
property.description: Path where artifacs such as MapReduce JAR files are saved.
